Package be.helha.api_recettapp.services

Interface IRecipeService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RecipeServiceDB
public interface IRecipeService
Interface for managing recipes in the system.

  • Method Details

    • getRecipes

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Recipe> getRecipes(String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable page)
      Retrieves a paginated list of recipes.
      Parameters:
      page - the Pageable object containing pagination information.
      keyword - the term search.
      Returns:
      a Page of Recipe objects.

    • getRecipes

      List<Recipe> getRecipes()
      Retrieves a list of all recipes.
      Returns:
      a List of Recipe objects.

    • addRecipe

      Recipe addRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Adds a new recipe to the system.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to add.
      Returns:
      the added Recipe object.

    • updateRecipe

      Recipe updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      Updates an existing recipe in the system.
      Parameters:
      recipe - the Recipe object to update.
      Returns:
      the updated Recipe object.

    • deleteRecipe

      void deleteRecipe(int id)
      Deletes a recipe from the system by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Recipe to delete.

    • getRecipeById

      Recipe getRecipeById(int id)
      Retrieves a list of all recipes.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the Recipe to get.
      Returns:
      a Recipe objects.

    • getRecipeByIdContest

      List<Recipe> getRecipeByIdContest(int idContest)
      Retrieves all recipes that belong to a specific contest.
      Parameters:
      idContest - The ID of the contest.
      Returns:
      A list of recipes associated with the contest.

    • getRecipeByUserMail

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Recipe> getRecipeByUserMail(String userMail, String keyword, int page, int size)
      Retrieves paginated recipes created by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userMail - the unique identifier of the user.
      keyword - term researched
      page - and size The pagination information.
      size - size of the pagination
      Returns:
      A paginated list of recipes.

    • anonymizeRecipe

      boolean anonymizeRecipe(int recipeId)
      Sets the "masked" field of a recipe to true, effectively anonymizing it.
      Parameters:
      recipeId - The ID of the recipe to anonymize.
      Returns:
      boolean if the recipe is anonymized
